## WCH\_PROVIDER\_COMPONENT\_RESOLVER variable

Declares the provider

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
WCH_PROVIDER_COMPONENT_RESOLVER: import("@acoustic-content-sdk/react-api").ReactProvider<import("@acoustic-content-sdk/react-api").ComponentResolver>
```
